name: Something went wrong and...
description:
"Something went wrong and I reincarnated as a pointer in an old personal computer which is happy to meet me by some reason" - title of our entry for GMTK Game Jam 2021. This is first ever isekai related computer game made within 48-hour window by IDLE BUM. All conditions joined together!

Controls - click 'n' drag

Music, Code and Arts - IDLE BUM
SFX - various free sites

Enjoy playing!
